New Records: Washington Sundar scored 50 off 28 to join MS Dhoni's elite club of T20Is where batters have scored 50-plus runs batting at no.6 or below
Key Match Events: India lost the first T20I against New Zealand by 21 runs in Ranchi
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's star all-rounder Axar Patel clobbered 65 off 31 against Sri Lanka in 2023
India's veteran batter Dinesh Karthik cracked 55 off 27 against South Africa in 2022
The legendary MS Dhoni whacked 52 off 28 against South Africa in 2018
India's star batter Manish Pandey smashed 50 off 36 against New Zealand in 2020
